Controller
Class MainControlThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Controller.MainControlThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MainControlThread
extends java.lang.Thread

Main control thread, connect and communicate with the robot. Use commandQueue to send instructions

Version:
1.0.12.09.2012
Author:
DaweiG
